mapper.select: SELECT c.memSeq, c.memXdmNy, c.memName, c.memId, c.memPassword, c.memGender, c.memBirth, c.memEmail, c.memPhone, c.memDesc, c.memDelNy, c.memRegist, c.memEdit FROM bears.member c ORDER BY c.memSeq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( memXdmNy, memName, memId, memPassword, memGender, memBirth, memEmail, memPhone, memDesc, memDelNy, memRegist, memEdit )VALUES( #{memXdmNy}, #{memName}, #{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memGender}, #{memBirth}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memDesc}, #{memDelNy}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.memSeq, c.memXdmNy, c.memName, c.memId, c.memPassword, c.memGender, c.memBirth, c.memEmail, c.memPhone, c.memDesc, c.memDelNy, c.memRegist, c.memEdit FROM bears.member c WHERE 1=1 AND c.memSeq = #{memSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE bears.member SET memXdmNy = #{memXdmNy}, memName = #{memName}, memId = #{memId}, memPassword = #{memPassword}, memGender = #{memGender}, memBirth = #{memBirth}, memEmail = #{memEmail}, memPhone = #{memPhone}, memDesc = #{memDesc}, memDelNy = #{memDelNy} WHERE 1 = 1 AND memSeq = #{memSeq}
